entries.title: 'Knives Out' Sequel Delivers in Theaters for Streaming Giant Netflix
entries.description: Strong showing for “Glass Onion: A Knives Out Mystery” could bolster argument for some theatrical release for streamers’ movies.

entries.title: Disney's Robert Iger Faces Troubled Animation Market
entries.description: “Strange World,” the entertainment company’s latest release, becomes its second straight animated flop, after “Lightyear.”

entries.title: FTX's Collapse Upends Sam Bankman-Fried's Washington Play
entries.description: Sam Bankman-Fried’s Washington charm offensive revolved around a small financial regulator and a group of senators with whom the purported crypto billionaire found common cause in a bid for light-touch regulation of digital assets.

entries.title: Crypto Entrepreneurs Fail to Capture Musk's Attention With Goat Statue
entries.description: Co-founders of the Elon GOAT token delivered the 12,000-pound sculpture to Tesla’s Austin headquarters, but the billionaire didn’t respond.
